thread.title: Sunday Sound Off: Is Andy Reid on the hot seat?
thread.title_full: Sunday Sound Off: Is Andy Reid on the hot seat?

author: 41 Action News Staff
title: Sunday Sound Off: Is Andy Reid on the hot seat?
text:
Next 
KANSAS CITY, Mo. - Frank Boal discussed sports with experts on Sunday night. 
Soren Petro and TJ Carpenter with 810 Sports and former Royals outfielder Les Norman discussed all the hot topics about the Royals, the Chiefs and college football. 
This week's topics: Are John Dorsey and Andy Reid on the hot seat? Is Jamaal Charles done? Is Chase Utleyâ€™s two-game suspension warranted?
